cnbc.summary: Gap, which owns Banana Republic, Old Navy, Athleta and its namesake banner, saw comparable sales rise 5% during the quarter, indicating its taking market share.

cnbc.title: White House crafting executive order to thwart state AI laws
cnbc.summary: The draft surfaced after President Donald Trump called for a single federal standard on AI "instead of a patchwork of 50 State Regulatory Regimes."

cnbc.title: Mercedes F1 boss Toto Wolff sells a piece of his ownership stake to CrowdStrike CEO George Kurtz
cnbc.summary: CrowdStrike CEO George Kurtz has acquired a minority stake in Mercedes-AMG Petronas F1 and will be a tech advisor to the motorsport team.

cnbc.title: Average 401(k), IRA balances hit record highs amid 2025's market gains
